body:
Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/frame.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/d6f7fbf261e7528e32721b6707c303bd8d71ef7d/pandas/core/frame.py) !

 - In the file [`pandas/core/ops.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/d6f7fbf261e7528e32721b6707c303bd8d71ef7d/pandas/core/ops.py), following                are the PEP8 issues :
> [Line 931:13](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/d6f7fbf261e7528e32721b6707c303bd8d71ef7d/pandas/core/ops.py#L931): [W504](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W504) line break after binary operator


 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/frame/test_arithmetic.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/d6f7fbf261e7528e32721b6707c303bd8d71ef7d/pandas/tests/frame/test_arithmetic.py) !



##### Comment last updated on October 02, 2018 at 01:38 Hours UTC
Looks like Series/DataFrame have some different behavior for bool ops... will look into this.
